channel.title: How do i read the password, its a bunch of numbers and not the pass
channel.description: :confused: i looked up my own pass word and its a bunch of numbers and not the password, hoew can i read it?

item.title: How do i read the password, its a bunch of numbers and not the pass
item.dc:creator: @katzcinky katzcinky
item.description:
@katzcinky wrote:

alright, well even if u are, i recommend leaving hashpw in (which is what encrypts the passes) so people do actually trust you and play on ur hopefully awesome server.

item.title: How do i read the password, its a bunch of numbers and not the pass

theres a tutorial in the tutorials section on how to make decrypted passwords. but if you hav that on your server you can use it to steal people’s real runescape name/pass and hack, and no1 will play ur server just because u hav it, becuz they will think ur a haxx0r even tho u might not be.
